name: Paired
description:
PAIRED is a rogue-like game based on 2 characters.

The one you move is a melee attacker, the other that follow is a ranged shooter.

Commands
q: melee attack
w: ranged attack
hbnm :run (+left shift walk)

Game ends when you die.
Remember to set difficulty in options.

Update 17.03.2018 - bugfixes - The ranged shooter now get the health drops
